entry.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Maintenance on all cluster
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Feb 18, 16:59 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the maintenance.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Start time : 21/03/2025 00:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically:
• Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters.
• Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications.
In addition :
• Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 002 / 005 / 007 / 010 / 012 / 013 / 014 / 017 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Possible slowness on mails on clusters 005 / 017 : Sending mail from websites may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Slowness on operations on clusters 011 / 014 / 017
Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/ndkfnxy1ylv4

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 14, 22:54 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 20/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 00:00 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Web Cloud] - MySQL 8.0 Database Upgrade maintenance
entry.content:
Feb 26, 10:05 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All the services are now operational since 11h03 UTC.

Feb 20, 09:15 UTC
Update - 65% of all clusters are now upgraded.
Our technical team will continue the upgrade on 2025-02-24.

Feb 13, 09:54 UTC
Update - 26.6% of all clusters are now upgraded.
Our technical team will continue the upgrade on 2025-02-17.

Feb 6, 09:31 UTC
Update - 11.5% of all clusters are now upgraded.
Our technical team will continue the upgrade on 2025-02-10..

Jan 30, 09:37 UTC
Update - Update : 2.3% of all clusters are now upgraded.
Our technical team will continue the upgrade on 2025-02-03.

Jan 28, 10:38 UTC
Update - Update : 100 more containers have been upgraded.
We will begin to increase the number of containers being upgraded on a daily basis.
Please note that upgrades will continue to be conducted from Monday to Thursday.

Jan 27, 10:59 UTC
Update - Update : The first 100 containers have been upgraded.

Jan 27, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 15, 16:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Database offer.

Start time : 27/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 27/02/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : 1 minute downtime per customer.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing an upgrade on MySQL 8.0

Thank you for your understanding.

• Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications.
• Possible slowness on metrics or logs : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
In addition :
• Difficulty accessing FTP/SSH on clusters 002, 011, 015, 028, 029 : You may encounter errors or difficulties when trying to access your FTP/SSH accounts on these clusters.

Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/n7s8mjfbtjcx

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.
